{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Roku |model=LT |revision=(2400X) |asin= |fcc_date=09/27/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=media streamer |fcc_id=TC22400X |ic_id=5959A-2400X |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM2835 |cpu1_cspeed=600 |cpu1_cores= |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27UF082G2B-TPCB |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4P2G324EC-AGC1 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=HDMI |expansion_usb_num= |expansion_hdmi_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4336 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips= |flags=bluetooth, HDMI, A/V out, |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=CC:6D:A0,00:0D:4B |oui_eth=CC:6D:A0,00:0D:4B }} {{TagLine|Streaming Media Player}} :[[Roku]]{{â€¢}}[[wikipedia:Roku|Roku on Wikipedia]] :[http://support.roku.com/entries/20345913-Product-Comparison-All-Roku-Player-Models Product Comparison All Roku Player Models]
Parts used in this device include.. *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/BCM2835 BCM2835] @600MHz ARM<small>1176JZ-F</small> :Dual Core HD Multimedia Processor <small>(under the RAM)</small> *WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM4336 (YKFFBG) 1T1R bgn This device will play HD video at resolution up to 720p.
*[https://www.engadget.com/2011/09/27/budget-friendly-roku-lt-pops-up-at-the-fcc-as-the-2400x/ ''Roku LT (2400X)'' on '''EnGadget'''] :[[Roku LT (2400X)]] (FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TC22400X TC22400X]) BCM4336 :OUI: 00:0D:4B, CC:6D:A0
